text.section: When the commission has probable cause to believe that a respondent has breached a conciliation agreement arising from a discriminatory housing practice, the commission shall reach an agreement for the respondent to voluntarily come into compliance or file an action in Circuit Court pursuant to KRS 344.665.
A civil action for breach shall be commenced within ninety (90) days of the commission receiving notice of the breach.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 282, sec. 18, effective July 14, 1992.
